The Berkeley YMCA offers delightfully economical gym membership and wonderful work out facilities for the whole community. It's spotless clean, the staff are friendly and always helpful and the hours are perfect. Exercise classes and workshops are offered both free and also at reasonable cost. I cant recommend this gym enough!!!

Love this YMCA!!! I have loved it since I came here for college over a decade ago and now I love it even more because of the recent renovations they‚Äôve completed. Honestly the best gym!! Highly recommend to anyone looking for a great community, workout, and AWESOME FACILITIES!! Such a gem :)

I stayed here for 4 nights, and my stay was good for the most part with clean rooms, good entertainment and evening socials (including free bbq food and drinks) in a central location. However, there was one poor experience I had which makes ‚Ä¶

Love the Banana ! We had so much fun here. The staff was really helpful and the place has bright colors and lots palm trees. They have secure parking, and the rooms have a private bathroom and cool kitchen, yes a full kitchen in our room, how awesome. Very affordable and excellent location, near all the hotspots in Hollywood.

For the price the rooms are clean and very nice! We had a bbq and I got to meet others from around the world! The gentleman who was in charge of the bbq was so nice and welcoming! If you go to Hollywood this is the place to go!

Great place and lots of fun. Thanks for the staff members to welcome us and host us with parties and the breakfast. And the place is nice and clean. The parking situation is very organized and they have basketball court too. And the pong table and bilyard too.

The beds were very comfortable, the air conditioning worked perfectly, and the breakfast was both generous and delicious. The front desk staff were always available and incredibly helpful. I also appreciated the cleanliness of the washrooms and the daily towel service. The place felt very secure, which was a big plus.

I had a great stay here.The hostel was clean, in a really good location, and the breakfast was totally fine to start the day. I also joined the Beverly Hills tour with Steven as the guide ‚Äì super fun and definitely worth it. Would recommend!

‚Ä¶ was pleasantly surprised. The service was good and the store was clean.  The shower was pretty clean as well and Del Taco hit the spot after a long day of driving. Overall a pretty nice truck stop for a state that hates truckers so much.

‚Ä¶ is the 2 star.   Buttons on pumps are broken so I had to pay inside.  Pumps themselves look rotten.  Shower smelled like puke?  And floor grimey, but shower shoes and the need prevailed on that one.  Water pressure very lacking and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ breakfast. Very tasty. Excellent waitress who was determined to provide the best service possible. Store is busy but a little expensive compared to rest of the nation. Ample parking. Very clean shower with amenities. Very friendly staff.

‚Ä¶ They are great and really hold the place together. I literally took a shower a day ago at a pilots, and I just spent $15 on a shower because I could not stomach using the public free restrooms. Can't say it was the worst $15 I ever spent. ‚Ä¶

Three stars because there is a nice restaurant across the street- Pea Soup Anderson's.
The waitress was rude, the laundry (washers) didn't spin the water out, and the dryers smelled funny. The shower was nice.
Shower was cold and expensive, 17$ per hour. Restrooms clean. Warmly hospitality from the employees. Nice place and good view with wildlife show outside the parking.
They have a Popeyes Chicken, Country Pride, and other things you can buy and microwave. Great place to rest and shower too. Safe place for kids and older ones.

‚Ä¶ today Sept 9 2019 the cook on shift (graveyard) was very very green.  Food was overcooked and portions were extremely small. I gave them a chance but since the diesel 50 to 60gal. To get a shower and no points for food purchases. I'm gone.

Clean facility and nice people. Too much water pressure and shower head wasn't adjustable. Right in the face. Popeyes is always good.

Thank you Loves for having a dog park at your establishment! Traveling several hours with dogs can be a challenge. I will definitely plan trips around your stops and will gladly spend my money there. The bathrooms were clean and stocked, staff was friendly and helpful.

Lots of parking. Dog park. Mexican fast food. Other dining available within walking distance. Store was clean. They have 3 washers and 5 dryers, they all worked well. Normal selections for a truck stop convenience store.

Ice is available.  The place is kept clean.

showerReviews.reviewText: The best hostel in Los Angeles! Two locations (Hollywood & West Hollywood).  As a solo traveler, it was easy to meet new people. Facilities were great! Modern-Retro style. Lots of outdoor lounge areas offered. Free Breakfast & staff were absolutely amazing!

I stayed here for 4 nights, and my stay was good for the most part with clean rooms, good entertainment and evening socials (including free bbq food and drinks) in a central location. However, there was one poor experience I had which makes ‚Ä¶

Love the Banana ! We had so much fun here. The staff was really helpful and the place has bright colors and lots palm trees. They have secure parking, and the rooms have a private bathroom and cool kitchen, yes a full kitchen in our room, how awesome. Very affordable and excellent location, near all the hotspots in Hollywood.

For the price the rooms are clean and very nice! We had a bbq and I got to meet others from around the world! The gentleman who was in charge of the bbq was so nice and welcoming! If you go to Hollywood this is the place to go!

Great place and lots of fun. Thanks for the staff members to welcome us and host us with parties and the breakfast. And the place is nice and clean. The parking situation is very organized and they have basketball court too. And the pong table and bilyard too.

The beds were very comfortable, the air conditioning worked perfectly, and the breakfast was both generous and delicious. The front desk staff were always available and incredibly helpful. I also appreciated the cleanliness of the washrooms and the daily towel service. The place felt very secure, which was a big plus.
